ygData.subject: Re: Question
ygData.msgSnippet: HOW DO I GET OFF THIS LIST ?????? PLEASE ??
ygData.messageBody:
HOW DO I GET OFF THIS LIST ?????? PLEASE ??


>From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Question
>Date: Thu, 16 Sep 1999 09:21:59 -0400
>
>From: "Brad Fetkovich" <fetko1@...>
>
>I always target the mob that our tanks are beating on.. i mainly only use
>ae's in upper zig in cazic, so i don't have to worry about the mobs coming
>after me..
>
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) <Michael.Garramone@...>
>To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Sent: Wednesday, September 15, 1999 5:27 PM
>Subject: RE: [eq_wizards] Question
>
>
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > yes our mana is calcualted by our charisma and dexterity. it is only
>for
> > one song, level 43, which i haven't used since it came out. they may
>have
> > fixed it though, it used to do damage to the bard singing it as well.
>guess
> > like a wizard AE spell? i have to play around with it, only problem is
>one
> > cast and we have to get our mana back to full. it takes 4 bubbs, and we
>can
> > not med, nor does our mana song or clarity help, just sitting. so how
>do
> > you cast an AE spell? i have heard horror stories about them. do you
> > target yourself, or a tank in your group? anyway, just a note on bard
>mana.
> >
> > Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
> > Erisi Dlarit, Level 23 High Elf Paladin
> > Tyria, Level 17 High Elf Wizard
> > Mithaniel Marr Server
> >
> > > From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>
> > >
> > > According to SPRUSBRUCE@...:
> > > > From: SPRUSBRUCE@...
> > > >
> > > > lol druids dont sing songs
> > >
> > > Was probably referring to bards. And I rather doubt bards get
> > > as much mana
> > > as wizards... unless their mana is charisma-based, that is :)
